featured.text: These patterns actually help the fish to hide from danger among roots and plants.
These sprouts grow slowly, nourished by the root system of the “mother” tree.
All the time that we spend rooted in the chair is linked to increased risks of so many deadly diseases that experts have named this modern-day health epidemic the “sitting disease.”
we must bear in mind that the love of money is also the root of all evil.

definition.zh_def: 根，植物的部分，通常位於土壤中，負責吸收水分和養分。
definition.en_def: The part of a plant that typically lies below the surface of the soil, responsible for absorbing water and nutrients.
definition.example: The tree's roots spread deep into the ground.
